item.title: New Positions on the Jobs Board
item.description:
New Positions on the Jobs Board # Charles Adjovu May 2 1
Photo by Hunter Harritt on Unsplash Some new positions on the Jobs Board. For more positions, check out the Jobs Board gallery. New positions # MetagovDAO Call for Proposals: Research + Community # This is a rolling funding opportunity for participants in the Metagov community and other researchers to receive support for their work.
